text: Benjamin Griveaux (born 29 December 1977) is a French politician.Affaire Benjamin Griveaux : que devient l'ancien ministre d'Emmanuel Macron ? He was Government Spokesman from 2017 to 2019 under Prime Minister Édouard Philippe.Benjamin Griveaux : qu’est-il devenu, trois ans après l’affaire des vidéos intimes ? He graduated from HEC Paris and Sciences Po.BENJAMIN GRIVEAUX == References == Category:1977 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of HEC Paris
title: Benjamin Griveaux
